welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Avon, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that Avon has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic flights for airlines such as United and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This concourse serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada and Frontier.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
